placeholderseparatepage: Print a separate page for the performer
placeholderseparateline: Add a separate line to get the result
placeholderbycategory: Do not take into account when generating the `Services by category` report
placeholdercreatingreport: Take into account for generating a report when sending for execution
placeholderexecutiondate: Setting the execution date by the executor
placeholdertransfertokai: Transfer flow to `Kai document` without checking for the presence of a file from the CEP
